name: Survive: Deadly Rock Attack
description:
You are a simple wolf in the middle of the smoldering desert. You are on a search for food and water when the area around you starts to shake and rumble. Searching for the source you notice a rock, pointy and sharp had risen out of the earth. Being curious you go over to the the rock and investigate. Before you could get even 3 feet in front of it it attacks!  

find a way to escape!

Controls

Space to Jump

Development Process

I wanted to make a side scrolling game that transitions after a couple of seconds as you have to avoid hazards. The wolf was an idea from a friend that suggested i make a runner for animals out in the wild. I wanted to take out the realism and use rocks instead of a predator for a more fantasy feel.

Credits:

SinWeaver for wolf Sprite
